content: from a design and pattern by crafty intentions caterpillar face/head using g or h hook you will need 1 bright green 2 kelly green 3 red 4 dark green 5 olive green 6 yellow and 7 purple worsted weight yarn 7 6 4 1 2 3 5 1 1 part one 1 start with bright green yarn chain 184 turn skip 1 chain st slip_stitch 50 single_crochet 133 2 chain 51 turn skip 1 chain st slip_stitch back 50 continue single_crochet 133 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 **in this and following row stitches should be made on the same side you have been working not the bottom or empty loops of the starting chain stitches 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 chain 3 9 do not turn slip_stitch into the first single_crochet in row 7 chain 1 continue in same direction and start in the same stitch you just slip stitched into single_crochet 136 slip_stitch into first single_crochet of the round 10 chain 3 blo double_crochet 6 double_crochet decrease x 17 slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the row fasten_off bright green yarn 11 attach olive green yarn where you left off double_crochet 5 double_crochet decrease x 17 slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the row fasten_off olive green yarn 12 attach red yarn where you left off double_crochet 4 double_crochet decrease x 17 slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the row 13 chain 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet decrease x 17 slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the row 14 chain 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet decrease x 17 slip_stitch into 1st double_crochet of the row 15 half_double_crochet around 51 fasten_off yarn weave in end part two 1 attach dark green yarn at the 1st single_crochet stitch of the bright green yarn from row 1 of part 1 chain 1 single_crochet 133 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by crafty intentions 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet 133 chain 51 turn skip 1 chain stitch slip_stitch 50 back 7 single_crochet 133 chain 51 turn skip 1 chain stitch slip_stitch 50 back fasten_off weave in ends part three eyes make 2 1 using the kelly green yarn single_crochet 8 in magic_ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet chain 1
